name: Leave me Alone (itch) (Vantack)
description:
Made by lazerb (Tovia botwinik) and vatnack (Sharron Lachman).

In Live me Alone you, a sad young dark wizard, decide to quit society and stay in your room forever. your mom, friends, and pets are not so happy with this decision and throw everything they've got to get you out.

move with W A S D
aim and shoot negative energy with the MOUSE

Entry for the Indie tales game jam! We only had about 9 hours to work on the project so it's not finished yet... It's playable from start to finish though, and we will finish it in the coming months.

thanks for playing! leave a comment :)
